com.complexible.common.io

Class ByteStreams2

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.complexible.common.io.ByteStreams2

  • public final class ByteStreams2
extends Object

    Utility class to hold functionality not already contained in ByteStreams

    Since:
    2.3.1

    • Method Detail

      • toByteArray

        public static byte[] toByteArray(Object theObj)
                          throws IOException
        Convert the object into an array of bytes. The object must be Serializable as this will use ObjectOutputStream to convert the object into a byte array. The results of this method can later be used in conjunction with ObjectInputStream to re-create the object.
        Parameters:
        theObj - the object to convert into a byte array
        Returns:
        the object as an array of bytes in its serialized form
        Throws:
        IOException - if there was an error while serializing the object
